noble thread 2019 rosebud � splitting for arms and body k2 row yellow break yellow with peach only k27 29 31 33 bobble sleeve stitches k51 55 60 64 bobble sleeve stitches k27 29 31 33 next row k27 29 31 33 co2 k51 55 60 64 co2 k27 29 31 33 knitting the body knit 3 5 7 9 row switch to us 4 knit even until peach only section is 1 1 3/8 1 3/4 2 1/8 switch to us 5 knit even until peach only section is 2 2 3/8 2 3/4 3 1/8 total ending with a rs row switch to us 6 do not break peach join pink ws k 2 row pink k 2 row peach repeat last 4 row until this section is 1 1 1/8 1 3/4 2 1/8 break peach switch to us 7 and with pink only knit even until pink section is 1 1 1/8 1 3/4 2 1/8 ending with a ws row next row rs k4 * k1 k1% repeat from * until 4 or 5 stitches remain k4 or 5 knit even for 1/2 ending on a ws row next row rs k4 * k1 k1% repeat from * until 4 or 5 stitches remain k4 or 5 k1 row bobble on rs using this stretchy bobble technique k1 *k1 knit the last 2 stitches together by inserting the needle in the front of these stitches repeat from * till all stitches have been bound off for personal use only copyright the noble thread 2019 rosebud � weave in all ends gently steam block sew 4
